module.name: odf_types

element.name: TOdfElement
element.short: OdfElement: Basedefinition of all Open-Document-Elements

element.name: TFontFaceDecls
element.short: FontFaceDecls definition of the shortcut-node for font-declarations.

element.name: TOdfDocument
element.short: OdfDocument basedefintion (it contains! the XMLStructure of the OpenDocument

element.name: TOdfContent
element.short: All parts that contain text are based on TOdfContent

element.name: THyperLink
element.short: THyperlink is a link to either a point in the document, a file or an url.

element.name: TOdfParagraph
element.short: OdfParagraph is the class for a paragraph in the text.

element.name: TSpan
element.short: Span is a (small) part of the text with a constant style.

element.name: TBookMark
element.short: BookMark is a point in the text the reader can jump to. (see also Hyperlink)

element.name: TOdfTextDocument
element.short: OdfTextDocument is the class to use to open, close & modify OpenDocument-Files

module.short: fpOdf is a library used to help users to create and to modify OpenDocument Files (ODF)

element.name: TOdfElement.Find
element.short: Find is a general method to find named items when the name of the item is in the attributes

element.name: TOdfTextDocument.Clear
element.short: Erase all content and create a new document

element.name: TOdfTextDocument.AddHeadline
element.short: Add a heading of a given level

element.name: TOdfContent.AppendText
element.short: Appends a text to a content-block

element.name: TOdfTextDocument.AddParagraph
element.short: Append a new paragraph of a given style

element.name: TOdfContent.AddSpan
element.short: Add a span to the paragraph
element.descr: A Span is a continuous part of the text with equal style.

element.name: TOdfContent.AddLineBreak
element.short: Appends a (manual) Line-break to the text.
element.descr: a Line-break stops the text at the current position in the line and continues the text at the start of the next line, but all in the same paragraph.

element.name: TOdfParagraph.AddBookmark
element.short: Adds a bookmark to the paragraph

element.name: TOdfContent.AddLink
element.short: appends a link (Hyperlink) to a bookmark

element.name: TOdfContent.AddTab
element.short: Appends a tabulator

element.name: TOdfElement.CreateDomElement
element.short: creates a DOM element of the specified type

element.name: TOdfElement.GetElementType
element.short: GetElementType returns the element type based on an index.

element.name: TOdfElement.GetDocument
element.short: the TOdfDocument associated with this element

element.name: TOdfElement.CreateOdfElement
element.short: creates an ODF element of the specified type

element.name: TOdfElement.OdfGetElementType
element.short: Returns the ODF element type for a given DOM element.

element.name: TOdfElement.SameType
element.short: Checks if two DOM elements have the same type.

element.name: TOdfElement.SetAttribute
element.short: Sets an attribute value for the parent element.

element.name: TOdfElement.OdfGetFirstElement
element.short: Returns the first child ODF element of the specified type.

element.name: TOdfElement.SetOrDeleteAttributes
element.short: Sets or deletes attributes based on the specified array.

element.name: TOdfElement.SetAttributes
element.short: Sets multiple attributes with corresponding values.

element.name: TOdfElement.DeleteAttributes
element.short: Deletes multiple attributes specified in the array.

element.name: TOdfElement.RemoveAttribute
element.short: Removes the attribute of the specified type.

element.name: TOdfElement.HasAttribute
element.short: Checks if the element has the specified attribute.

element.name: TOdfElement.GetAttributeString
element.short: Retrieves the attribute value as a string.

element.name: TOdfElement.GetAttribute
element.short: Retrieves the attribute of the specified type.

element.name: TOdfElement.FindStyle
element.short: Finds an ODF element with the given style name.

element.name: TOdfElement.HasOdfElement
element.short: Checks if the ODF element of the specified type exists.

element.name: TOdfElement.FindOdfElement
element.short: Finds and returns the first ODF element of the specified type.

element.name: TTextSequenceDecls
element.short: Defines a Delaration for a Text-sequence

element.name: TConfigConfigItemSet
element.short: Defines a set of Config-Config-items

element.name: TConfigConfigItemSet.ConfigName
element.short: the name of the config

element.name: TOdfColor
element.short: A color-record with three base-colors

element.name: TOdfFont
element.short: Font-definition for odf-files

element.name: TOdfSection
element.short: Section is collection of Paragraphes of the same formatting

element.name: TDefaultStyle
element.short: a text-style as default

element.name: cCharSpace
element.short: The space/blank character

element.name: cNone
element.short: the None-Tag

element.name: cFileContent
element.short: Name of the content-file

element.name: cFileStyles
element.short: name of the style-file

element.name: cIsoDateFormat
element.short: the date-format in the file

element.name: cMetaGenerator
element.short: the generator-name and version

element.name: cUrnOpenDocument
element.short: odf-namespace-definition

element.name: cUrlOasis
element.short: Url: Oasis

element.name: cUriOffice12Meta
element.short: url: Office

element.name: cUriOdfMeta
element.short: Url: Odf-Meta

element.name: cUrlW3
element.short: Url: W3

element.name: cOwnerAttr
element.short: The 'Owner' attribute
